label: lem-mass-conservation-transport
title: Mass Conservation of Transport
nl_statement: Under reflecting boundary conditions on position and velocity boundaries, the integral of the adjoint transport operator applied to a function over the domain Ω vanishes, conserving total mass.

hypotheses.text: Reflecting boundary conditions on position and velocity boundaries
Transport operator as defined with these boundary conditions

conclusion.text: The integral of the transport operator over the domain Ω vanishes

variables.name: adjoint transport operator
variables.description: The adjoint of the transport operator acting on functions in phase space

variables.name: density function
variables.description: A smooth function representing the density at time t and position z

variables.name: phase space variable
variables.description: Combined position and velocity variable in the domain Ω

variables.name: domain
variables.description: The phase space domain with reflecting boundaries

implicit_assumptions.text: The domain Ω is bounded with reflecting boundaries ensuring no flux across boundaries
f is sufficiently regular for the integral to be well-defined
